lead_paragraph: Losing the city for a second time would be a major blow for the Syrian government, which retook the city in March after 10 months of ISIS rule.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Hwaida Saad from Beirut, Lebanon, Maher Samaan from Paris, and an employee of The New York Times from Damascus, Syria.

headline.print_headline: ISIS Poised to Recapture Palmyra From Syrian Troops
headline.main: ISIS Close to Recapturing Palmyra From Syrian Forces

snippet: Losing the city for a second time would be a major blow for the Syrian government, which retook the city in March after 10 months of ISIS rule....
